TextLibrary.Text: Emperor Selentius XVII
Did my daughter give you any trouble?
Did my daughter give you any trouble?
Did my daughter give you any trouble?
Did my daughter give you any trouble?
To be perfectly honest, she was nothing BUT trouble. I did see her safely to her destination, though.
To be perfectly honest, she was nothing BUT trouble. I did see her safely to her destination, though.
To be perfectly honest, she was nothing BUT trouble. I did see her safely to her destination, though.
To be perfectly honest, she was nothing BUT trouble. I did see her safely to her destination, though.
You have my thanks, lad. We have fought with the Trarg too long. This wedding should bring an end to our troubles and save many lives.
You have my thanks, lad. We have fought with the Trarg too long. This wedding should bring an end to our troubles and save many lives.
You have my thanks, lass. We have fought with the Trarg too long. This wedding should bring an end to our troubles and save many lives.
You have my thanks, lass. We have fought with the Trarg too long. This wedding should bring an end to our troubles and save many lives.
It has been my experience that we cannot end our troubles - we can merely exchange one set for another.
It has been my experience that we cannot end our troubles - we can merely exchange one set for another.
It has been my experience that we cannot end our troubles - we can merely exchange one set for another.
It has been my experience that we cannot end our troubles - we can merely exchange one set for another.
Such a dark point of view for one so young! We must see what we can do about that! Will you stay for tonight's feast to celebrate the wedding?
Such a dark point of view for one so young! We must see what we can do about that! Will you stay for tonight's feast to celebrate the wedding?
Such a dark point of view for one so young! We must see what we can do about that! Will you stay for tonight's feast to celebrate the wedding?
Such a dark point of view for one so young! We must see what we can do about that! Will you stay for tonight's feast to celebrate the wedding?
Your Majesty, with all due respect, I must return to Agaria. My Queen is still waiting for your reply.
Your Majesty, with all due respect, I must return to Agaria. My Queen is still waiting for your reply.
Your Majesty, with all due respect, I must return to Agaria. My Queen is still waiting for your reply.
Your Majesty, with all due respect, I must return to Agaria. My Queen is still waiting for your reply.
Fine. Here is my answer...
Fine. Here is my answer...
Fine. Here is my answer...
Fine. Here is my answer...

We have had no trouble here with the undead. We are plagued by a group of cultists who call themselves The Dark Path, but they don't have dealings with the undead. Demons and Elementals, yes...but not things from beyond the grave.

We have had no trouble here with the undead. We are plagued by a group of cultists who call themselves The Dark Path, but they don't have dealings with the undead. Demons and Elementals, yes...but not things from beyond the grave.

We have had no trouble here with the undead. We are plagued by a group of cultists who call themselves The Dark Path, but they don't have dealings with the undead. Demons and Elementals, yes...but not things from beyond the grave.

We have had no trouble here with the undead. We are plagued by a group of cultists who call themselves The Dark Path, but they don't have dealings with the undead. Demons and Elementals, yes...but not things from beyond the grave.
I have marked the position of one of the cult's Shrines on your map. Stop there on your return trip if you want to confirm what I have said.
I have marked the position of one of the cult's Shrines on your map. Stop there on your return trip if you want to confirm what I have said.
I have marked the position of one of the cult's Shrines on your map. Stop there on your return trip if you want to confirm what I have said.
I have marked the position of one of the cult's Shrines on your map. Stop there on your return trip if you want to confirm what I have said.
As for your Queen's request for aid and troops, I must decline.
As for your Queen's request for aid and troops, I must decline.
As for your Queen's request for aid and troops, I must decline.
As for your Queen's request for aid and troops, I must decline.
Your Majesty, I have done all that you have asked of me. Surely you could spare a few men to aid the Queen in her time of need!
Your Majesty, I have done all that you have asked of me. Surely you could spare a few men to aid the Queen in her time of need!
Your Majesty, I have done all that you have asked of me. Surely you could spare a few men to aid the Queen in her time of need!
Your Majesty, I have done all that you have asked of me. Surely you could spare a few men to aid the Queen in her time of need!
It is not that simple, boy. These Undead and the sorcerers that control them are servants of Lord Bane in the north. If we help you, he will turn his gaze upon us. I cannot allow that.
It is not that simple, boy. These Undead and the sorcerers that control them are servants of Lord Bane in the north. If we help you, he will turn his gaze upon us. I cannot allow that.
It is not that simple, girl. These Undead and the sorcerers that control them are servants of Lord Bane in the north. If we help you, he will turn his gaze upon us. I cannot allow that.
It is not that simple, girl. These Undead and the sorcerers that control them are servants of Lord Bane in the north. If we help you, he will turn his gaze upon us. I cannot allow that.
If you don't help us now, Bane's Undead will overrun Agaria. Then, he will turn his gaze upon your lands anyway! If we stand together now, we might be able to defeat him!
If you don't help us now, Bane's Undead will overrun Agaria. Then, he will turn his gaze upon your lands anyway! If we stand together now, we might be able to defeat him!
If you don't help us now, Bane's Undead will overrun Agaria. Then, he will turn his gaze upon your lands anyway! If we stand together now, we might be able to defeat him!
If you don't help us now, Bane's Undead will overrun Agaria. Then, he will turn his gaze upon your lands anyway! If we stand together now, we might be able to defeat him!
Wild speculation! Bane's quarrel with the Knights is centuries old. When he has finished off Agaria, he will likely fade back into the north and leave the rest of us in peace!
Wild speculation! Bane's quarrel with the Knights is centuries old. When he has finished off Agaria, he will likely fade back into the north and leave the rest of us in peace!
Wild speculation! Bane's quarrel with the Knights is centuries old. When he has finished off Agaria, he will likely fade back into the north and leave the rest of us in peace!

So be it. I will deliver your message to the Queen. Farewell. I doubt we'll meet again.
So be it. I will deliver your message to the Queen. Farewell. I doubt we'll meet again.
So be it. I will deliver your message to the Queen. Farewell. I doubt we'll meet again.
So be it. I will deliver your message to the Queen. Farewell. I doubt we'll meet again.
Farewell, young Agarian. And good luck.
Farewell, young Agarian. And good luck.
Farewell, young Agarian. And good luck.
Farewell, young Agarian. And good luck.
